flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A case for holding
POKéBLOCKS made with
a BERRY BLENDER.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A case for holding
POKéBLOCKS made with

flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A case for holding POKéBLOCKS made
with a BERRY BLENDER. It releases
one POKéBLOCK when shaken.
